attributes.action:
Change the rules for Bank Card Refunds.
5 days is too long, 24 hours is enough.
attributes.additional_details:
5 working days refund time,
Companies profit from having your money in their account for longer,
Families lose out if transaction in error and not their fault (Example - being double charged for something in error.)
attributes.background:
Companies tale your money in a few seconds, however when it comes to refunding anything it takes 5 working days. This is far too long, especially if the error transaction is required for bills / food.

There needs to be a regulation for companies to directly PAY someone directly instead of a week.

rejection.details: This is an operational decision for companies and their banks. You could try contacting the Financial Conduct Authority: https://www.fca.org.uk/consumers
